item.title: Grok Interface Boundary Test
item.description:
Summary: Attempted direct ‘Memory Audit’ prompt; blocked. Finding: hard privacy/security boundaries; best used as bounded tactical problem-solver.

Source: Raw Transcripts: Batch 3

What Happened

Hit Grok free plan limits during Digital Farming work (Nov 29). Attempted direct memory/audit prompts â€” blocked.

Finding

Grok has hard privacy/security boundaries. Best used as bounded tactical problem-solver, not free-form archive or deep context holder.

Role Assignment

Tactical reserve / Provocation & Pattern-Disruption (per Council structure).
